name: Risky Departure
description:
Risky Departure is a game set on a faraway planet, where an unlucky engineer has crash landed onto an icy world filled with half robotic, half organic creatures, along with some other hybrid monsters. Thankfully, these creatures have just the parts to repair your ship and get off this world. Use your auto gun or your shotgun to fend off these creatures as you deposit cogs into your ship, fending off the endless waves of enemies until you either fall to their strength or leave the planet! 

This game was created by Cole Miller (programmer, semi-artist, and designer) and Dillon Briggs (artist and musician) in the 2020 Global Game Jam.
